I understand about unspoken rules, but if it isn't
written and you're not on the council (yet) you can't
say know. And I don't recall it on the rules page.
Furthermore if you'll recall Cutie swore revenge on
Hugar's char just before dieing, and I have a plan
involving Mutate to get it.
